alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 6:36PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Tolland, northeastern Hartford, southwestern Worcester, south central Hampshire and southeastern Hampden Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 635 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Suffield, or near Enfield. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Rain in excess of 1 inch SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Do not drive through flooded roads or underpasses. Avoid low lying areas near small streams. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Hartford, Chicopee, Enfield, Westfield, Windsor, Agawam, West Springfield, South Windsor, Simsbury, Ludlow, Bloomfield, Longmeadow, Suffield, East Longmeadow, Ellington, Belchertown, Wilbraham, Windsor Locks and Palmer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
